attributes.action: The government must put prosperity ahead of prejudice.
attributes.background:
Following the referendum result the government will be required to trade off access to the single market against controls on the movement of labour. 
We would like the government to prioritise prosperity over prejudice and negotiate the best possible ongoing trade terms for Britain.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
